sourceMeaningMnemonic: You <radical>run</radical> and <radical>call</radical> out to people at the same time because you're <kanji>super</kanji> <kanji>ultra</kanji> excited right now. You have a super crazy amount of energy you need to get out with your running and calling.
meaningInfo: You're going for an ultra run, calling out with your super loud voice right down the middle of the street.
readingMnemonic: You're just becoming <kanji>ultra</kanji> tired when you hear a terrifying sound. It's Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading> (<ja>ちょう</ja>) barreling down toward you. "WERE YOU CALLING FOR ME, CHILD?!" she screams.
readingInfo: Mrs. Chou is super ultra scary. And if you don't kick it into super ultra high gear she's going to catch up to you and make you super ultra dead.
